sentence.Network_en: Their artistry was high, he denied the worthwhileness of artistry when divorced from humanness.
sentence.Network_cn: 技巧颇高, 但他并不承认脱离了人性的技巧会有什么价值.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 答： R. S. Peters 认为教育应遵循「合价值性」(worthwhileness)、「合认知性」(cogni- tiveness)及「合自愿性」(voluntariness)三项 …
有价值性（worthwhileness）：研究的意义及其合理性。　　认知性（cognitiveness）：分析方法要注重理性思考和逻辑推理。
Follow Nomadic Design: 庄卉家的设计漫游... ... Worthwhileness 值得的宝贝 The Elegiac Sound of Cicadas 哀伤的蝉声.

list.abs: 大学体验英语(二) ... get just enough money for all one’s needs 使收支相抵 be worthwhile 是值得的 because of 幸亏.
That's the way it is. 就是这么回事。That's worthwhile. 那是值得的。The same to you. 你也一样。
let Us SmileThe thing that goes the farthest toward making life worthwhile , That costs the least and the most , is just a pleasant smile .让我们继续微笑，那最能赋予生命价值、代价最廉而回报最多的东西，不过一个令人心畅的微笑而已。
